summary: Took me a few days to get this to even where I was "somewhat" happy with it.  Found out quickly that the colors of real life don't transfer to the game 100%, in fact, no where near it.  My condolences for anyone porting real life works into the game, the colors must be a pest.
descriptionHtml:
Took me a few days to get this to even where I was "somewhat" happy with it.  Found out quickly that the colors of real life don't transfer to the game 100%, in fact, no where near it.  My condolences for anyone porting real life works into the game, the colors must be a pest.


Used:

   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu 3.2.2[/url]
   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]Apachii Hair 1.6[/url] (Full, but uses Hair # 37)
   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963]True Eyes[/url] (The only "black" eye I could find that looked good, anyone have an alternative eye, do share)
   UNPB with default natural textures (you could probably use any other body with this)

Nord Race (was the only race I found that the face didn't get mangled with).

Do put screen shots in if you use her and do say what you used if there are any special items/outfits.  Thanks to SKSE and RaceMenu for providing an immense increase in design control over mods and character appearance.

GuruSR.
author: GuruSR
